html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-08112012-06-19,  HRSDC,  ,  , 
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS, in order to (1) extend the Best 14 Weeks pilot project for nine months to collect data on claimants' behavioural changes in anticipation of the new Variable Best Weeks approach; (2) introduce a new Working While on Claim pilot project to test a new approach to create incentives to accept more available work while claiming Employment Insurance.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0128 Publication Date: 2012-07-04
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS, in order to (1) extend the Best 14 Weeks pilot project for nine months to collect data on claimants' behavioural changes in anticipation of the new Variable Best Weeks approach; (2) introduce a new Working While on Claim pilot project to test a new approach to create incentives to accept more available work while claiming Employment Insurance.
